llm_decision.raw:
LANGUAGE: Hindi  
TRANSCRIPTION: तुम्हारे पास तीन महीने बच्चे हैं  
CONFIDENCE: high  
REASONING: The hypothesis from MMS-1B ("तुम्हारे पास तीन महीने बच्चे हैं") is the most accurate and grammatically correct. It correctly uses "तुम्हारे" (your), "तीन महीने" (three months), and "बच्चे हैं" (are children), which aligns with the intended meaning. Whisper's version uses "तुमारे" (less standard) and "बच्छे" (spelling error), while Omni's is missing the final "ं" in "हैं". MMS-ZeroShot-Constrained is completely incorrect and likely due to poor lexicon constraints. Thus, MMS-1B's output is selected as the best.
